languages.text: {n}Слова праведного гимна взрезают поток нечестивых речей еретика. Вы чувствуете, будто свет самого Императора касается вашего сердца, согревая его благодатью, и защищая от тлетворного воздействия скверны.{/n}

{n}The words of the righteous hymn cut through the torrent of the heretic's impious proclamations. You feel as if the light of the Emperor Himself touches your heart, warming it with grace and protecting it from the malignant corruption.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Слова праведного гимна взрезают поток нечестивых речей еретика. Вы чувствуете, будто свет самого Императора касается вашего сердца, согревая его благодатью, и защищая от тлетворного воздействия скверны.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The words of the righteous hymn cut through the torrent of the heretic's impious proclamations. You feel as if the light of the Emperor himself touches your heart, warming it with grace and protecting it from the malignant corruption.{/n}

{n}The words of the righteous hymn cut through the torrent of the heretic's impious proclamations. You feel as if the light of the Emperor Himself touches your heart, warming it with grace and protecting it from the malignant corruption.{/n}

languages.text: {n}正義の賛美歌の言葉は、異端の不信心な宣言の奔流を切り裂いた。皇帝の光があたなの心に触れ、恵みによって温められる。悪意ある腐敗から護られているように感じられた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words of the righteous hymn cut through the torrent of the heretic's impious proclamations. You feel as if the light of the Emperor Himself touches your heart, warming it with grace and protecting it from the malignant corruption.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}正義の賛美歌の言葉は、異端の不信心な宣言の奔流を切り裂いた。皇帝の光があたなの心に触れ、恵みによって温められる。悪意ある腐敗から護られているように感じられた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les paroles de l'hymne vertueux noient les cris de contestation impies des hérétiques. Vous avez l'impression que la lumière de l'Empereur lui-même réchauffe votre cœur, vous offrant grâce et protection contre les perversions de la corruption.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words of the righteous hymn cut through the torrent of the heretic's impious proclamations. You feel as if the light of the Emperor Himself touches your heart, warming it with grace and protecting it from the malignant corruption.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les paroles de l'hymne vertueux noient les cris de contestation impies des hérétiques. Vous avez l'impression que la lumière de l'Empereur lui-même réchauffe votre cœur, vous offrant grâce et protection contre les perversions de la corruption.{/n}

languages.text: {n}正义赞美诗的祷词打断了那个异端分子邪恶布道的洪流。你仿佛感觉到帝皇的明光照亮了你的心房，赐予你温暖的恩典，保护你的灵魂远离邪恶的腐化。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words of the righteous hymn cut through the torrent of the heretic's impious proclamations. You feel as if the light of the Emperor Himself touches your heart, warming it with grace and protecting it from the malignant corruption.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}正义赞美诗的祷词打断了那个异端分子邪恶布道的洪流。你仿佛感觉到帝皇的明光照亮了你的心房，赐予你温暖的恩典，保护你的灵魂远离邪恶的腐化。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las palabras de aquel virtuoso himno siegan la vorágine de impías proclamas del hereje. Sientes como si la luz del mismísimo Emperador tocara tu corazón, colmándolo de su gracia y protegiéndolo de la maligna corrupción.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words of the righteous hymn cut through the torrent of the heretic's impious proclamations. You feel as if the light of the Emperor Himself touches your heart, warming it with grace and protecting it from the malignant corruption.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las palabras de aquel virtuoso himno siegan la vorágine de impías proclamas del hereje. Sientes como si la luz del mismísimo Emperador tocara tu corazón, colmándolo de su gracia y protegiéndolo de la maligna corrupción.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Worte der rechtschaffenen Hymne durchschneiden den Schwall der blasphemischen Verkündungen des Ketzers. Du fühlst dich, als würde das Licht des Imperators selbst dein Herz berühren, es wärmen und vor der bösartigen Korruption beschützen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words of the righteous hymn cut through the torrent of the heretic's impious proclamations. You feel as if the light of the Emperor Himself touches your heart, warming it with grace and protecting it from the malignant corruption.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Worte der rechtschaffenen Hymne durchschneiden den Schwall der blasphemischen Verkündungen des Ketzers. Du fühlst dich, als würde das Licht des Imperators selbst dein Herz berühren, es wärmen und vor der bösartigen Korruption beschützen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Meşru ilahinin sözleri, kâfirin dinsiz ilam sağanağını kesiyor. İmparator Hazretleri'nin ışığının kalbine dokunduğunu, onu nuruyla ısıttığını ve habis yozlaşmadan koruduğunu hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words of the righteous hymn cut through the torrent of the heretic's impious proclamations. You feel as if the light of the Emperor Himself touches your heart, warming it with grace and protecting it from the malignant corruption.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Meşru ilahinin sözleri, kâfirin dinsiz ilam sağanağını kesiyor. İmparator'un ışığının kalbine dokunduğunu, onu nuruyla ısıttığını ve habis yozlaşmadan koruduğunu hissediyorsun.{/n}
